summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganMorphe's Filter Effect Soft Radiance Concealer flexes to brighten, conceal, and sculpt a full range of skin tones with high-performing hyaluronic acid and pomegranate seed extract.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates & nourishesSweatproof, transfer-resistant & water-resistantLong-wearingGreat for all skin typesOphthalmologist testedNoncomedogenicKey IngredientsA brightening pomegranate seed extract & hydrating hyaluronic acid for a soft, healthy-looking radiance that will have your complexion looking and feeling so goodFormulated WithoutOilsFragranceParabensItem 2593388How To UseConcealer is not just for spot-correction. It can also highlight and contour.If you want to use it to cancel out your skin concerns, consider what you want to conceal. Use warm yellow and golden shades to neutralize redness and inflammation. Use cool or neutral peach-based shades to counteract yellowish or bluish under-eye circles. Use cool pink tones to brighten hyperpigmentation or discoloration.If you want to use it to highlight, after spot-correcting, pick a shade that's two shades lighter than your skin tone in your undertone. Apply the formula to the high points of your face.If you want to use it to contour, create that extra dimension with a shade that's two to four shades deeper than your skin tone in a neutral undertone.IngredientsWater (Aqua, Eau), Isohexadecane, Isododecane, Dimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, C13-15 Alkane, Glycerin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Tribehenin, Polysilicone-11, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Maltodextrin, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Punica Granatum Seed Extract, Propylene Carbonate, Alpinia Galanga Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Trisodium EDTA, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate. May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Concealer is not just for spot-correction. It can also highlight and contour.If you want to use it to cancel out your skin concerns, consider what you want to conceal. Use warm yellow and golden shades to neutralize redness and inflammation. Use cool or neutral peach-based shades to counteract yellowish or bluish under-eye circles. Use cool pink tones to brighten hyperpigmentation or discoloration.If you want to use it to highlight, after spot-correcting, pick a shade that's two shades lighter than your skin tone in your undertone. Apply the formula to the high points of your face.If you want to use it to contour, create that extra dimension with a shade that's two to four shades deeper than your skin tone in a neutral undertone.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I tend to use this like makeup so as to not look cakes. I have a skin condition from a product that I used in 2019. I never had to wear makeup before ( only if I wanted to).

reviews.headline: Stains Clothing!!
reviews.comments: Ruined my daughter's first day of school shirt when it splattered on her upon opening. Tried everything and I mean everything to get it out until I eventually had to stop due to damaging the fabric. Going in the trash. If it permanently stains fabric like paint, it should not be going on a face or skin! Even lipstick comes out….not this crap.

reviews.headline: Beautiful Finish and excellent shade selection!
reviews.comments: Absolutely minimal creasing when applied alone.

reviews.headline: I LOVE THIS CONCEALER
reviews.comments: This concealer is amazing, i was a bit hesitant but when i tried it OH MY GOSH the best concealer ive tried!!

reviews.headline: Amazing Coverage
reviews.comments: Full coverage, affordable, fair range of shades, creamy on the skin but not heavy, no weird smells. I just wish they had a pinky shade.

reviews.headline: Perfect coverage
reviews.comments: I apply a small amount and I'm covered all day. Long lasting and good coverage.

reviews.headline: Perfect!
reviews.comments: I use this concealer all over my face and it immediately corrects all discoloration and dark circles. Its creamy and smooth and blends PERFECTLY!!! It isnt patchy and it stays all day long without melting off.

reviews.headline: Perfect Concealer
reviews.comments: This is my favorite concealer. And It it priced just right.

reviews.headline: okay lowkey i wasnt expecting much but i was surprised
reviews.comments: pleasantly surprised goes on smooth and lightweight, but still very full coverage and last me through an eight hour shift

reviews.headline: Nars dupe
reviews.comments: Great coverage

reviews.headline: I love this concealer!
reviews.comments: My skin is sensitive, acne prone/combination. It's usually hard to match my exact shade. This concealer not only matches perfectly, it does not break me out or cause irritation. No creasing either. I actually wear it in place of foundation most days as it does not feel heavy on my face. The price point is awesome too! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Great quality
reviews.comments: Full coverage

reviews.headline: No coverage
reviews.comments: It just looks good for few minutes after that my dark circles start to show. No coverage not a little bit even for natural look.

reviews.headline: No coverage
reviews.comments: It just looks good for few minutes after that my dark circles start to show. No coverage not a little bit even for natural look.

reviews.headline: Perfect!
reviews.comments:
This is just what I needed and the color was absolutely a perfect fit for my skin tone.
I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.headline: What's not to like????
reviews.comments: Simple, easy to use, light/medium coverage for those who like to build your look. Let it dry down a little first! I never have creasing. It does what it says it does. I see on here that the smell is something being pointed out….it just isn't loaded with fragrance, which is a huge plus for me! I have sensitive skin,  a little on the oily side, never broke out from using or had any problems with this product. Money well spent! Also the swirl blush and cream bronzer BOTH blend like a dream and also have hardly any smell! In general I'm glad I revisited Morphe! So afordable too!

reviews.headline: Awful and toxic
reviews.comments: I never write reviews but have to for this. As soon as I opened up the concealer it smelled so bad like chemicals. I don't know how to explain it but something you wouldn't want to put on your face… go get Maybellines instead

reviews.headline: 2nd time buying
reviews.comments: I'm onto my second purchase but I bought the wrong shade, which is fine because I mix it with a different product so it works out in the end

reviews.headline: My Absolute Favorite!
reviews.comments: This is my concealer of choice every time! I buy several at a time to make sure I don't run out. It covers perfectly but doesn't looked caked on.  Because of the consistency you don't have to use very much.

reviews.headline: My new favorite concealer
reviews.comments: It is the perfect everyday lightweight, medium coverage concealer. It has become my new favorite concealer after my previous one was discontinued from wet and wild. Definitely recommend!

faceoff_positive.comments: Morphe Filter Effect Soft Radiance Concealer in Light 6 is the perfect skin tone match for me  which is rare! It also perfectly matches Morphe Filter Soft-Focus Foundation in Filter Light 6. It's a neutral light shade with a slight hint of warmth. It's not as longwearing on acne scars  however  it wears nicely on the undereyes. It never looks patchy or dry  and it has buildable medium to full coverage without looking cakey. It's not transfer-proof as it does transfer onto face masks  however  it is transfer resistant. It has a skin-like natural satin finish. Also  it's infused with great ingredients such as hyaluronic acid and glycerin  which gives it a hydration and moisture boost. I can see this working on dry and sensitive skin. Moreover  I love that it has a flat flexible long doe foot applicator  which holds a lot of product  so you can conceal all the spots on the entire face without redipping. And the applicator is narrow and flexible  so it's easy to control how much you want to apply to a spot. And  it comes in 20 different shades.
faceoff_positive.headline: Hydrating and perfect tone match!

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this concealer for free from Influenster and Morphe in exchange for my honest review.  I have dark skin and deal with dark spots due to hyperpigmentation so I was exited to try this new formula which included ingredients to brighten and care for skin while wearing - I'm conflicted with the fact it contain hyaluronic acid as if you are already using skincare that contains this is may be damaging in the long run so keep that in mind.  The packaging and containers were very nice and the consistency was very smooth and not heavy or sticky. I probably would have picked a darker colour but nonetheless this could still work especially when used for highlighting and contouring.  I also tried this with the foundation but I found they didn't sit well unfortunately not sure why that it is but I did find the foundation to be somewhat chalky so that could be why.  Overall I would recommend this concealer especially if you have oily skin such as myself.
faceoff_negative.headline: Smooth Application
